meanings.definition: The state or quality of being dowdy.
meanings.sent1: Her dowdinesses were evident in her old-fashioned dress and messy hair.
meanings.sent2: The dowdinesses of her outfit made her stand out at the trendy party.
meanings.sent3: Despite her dowdinesses, she always had a smile that brightened the room.
meanings.sent4: The dowdinesses of the antique shop gave it a charming, vintage feel.
meanings.sent5: The dowdinesses of the old library created a cozy and nostalgic atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The appearance or style of being unfashionable or outdated.
meanings.sent1: The dowdinesses of his clothes made him look like he was from another era.
meanings.sent2: She tried to update her wardrobe to avoid the dowdinesses of her usual style.
meanings.sent3: The dowdinesses of the retro furniture gave the room a quirky vibe.
meanings.sent4: Her dowdinesses stood out in a crowd of trendy fashionistas.
meanings.sent5: The dowdinesses of the old car added character to the street.
